chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall trace : list (input * output), trace_correct' init trace -> trace_correct trace

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
init = fun (P : BaseParams) (OneNodeParams0 : OneNodeParams P) => let (init, _) := OneNodeParams0 in init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> Net.data Arguments init {P OneNodeParams}
Inductive output : Set := Response : key -> option value -> option value -> output
Inductive input : Set := Put : key -> value -> input | Get : key -> input | Del : key -> input | CAS : key -> option value -> value -> input | CAD : key -> value -> input
Inductive trace_correct' : data -> list (input * output) -> Prop := TC'nil : forall st : data, trace_correct' st [] | TC'App : forall (st : data) (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct' st t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) (Map.find (input_key i) st) = (v, o) -> trace_correct' st (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)]) Arguments trace_correct' _ _%list_scope Arguments TC'App _ _%list_scope
Inductive trace_correct : list (input * output) -> Prop := TCnil : trace_correct [] | TCApp : forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> trace_correct (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)]) Arguments trace_correct _%list_scope Arguments TCApp _%list_scope
inputs_with_key = fun (trace : list (input * output)) (k : key) => filterMap (fun ev : input * output => if key_eq_dec k (input_key (fst ev)) then Some (fst ev) else None) trace : list (input * output) -> key -> list input Arguments inputs_with_key _%list_scope
trace_correct_sind : forall P : list (input * output) -> SProp, P [] -> (forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> P t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> P (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])) -> forall l : list (input * output), trace_correct l -> P l
trace_correct_ind : forall P : list (input * output) -> Prop, P [] -> (forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> P t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> P (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])) -> forall l : list (input * output), trace_correct l -> P l
Inductive trace_correct : list (input * output) -> Prop := TCnil : trace_correct [] | TCApp : forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> trace_correct (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)]) Arguments trace_correct _%list_scope Arguments TCApp _%list_scope
trace_correct'_sind : forall P : data -> list (input * output) -> SProp, (forall st : data, P st []) -> (forall (st : data) (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct' st t -> P st t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) (Map.find (input_key i) st) = (v, o) -> P st (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])) -> forall (d : data) (l : list (input * output)), trace_correct' d l -> P d l
trace_correct'_ind : forall P : data -> list (input * output) -> Prop, (forall st : data, P st []) -> (forall (st : data) (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct' st t -> P st t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) (Map.find (input_key i) st) = (v, o) -> P st (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])) -> forall (d : data) (l : list (input * output)), trace_correct' d l -> P d l
TCApp : forall (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) None = (v, o) -> trace_correct (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])
TC'App : forall (st : data) (t : list (input * output)) (i : input) (v o : option value), trace_correct' st t -> interpret (input_key i) (i :: rev (inputs_with_key t (input_key i))) (Map.find (input_key i) st) = (v, o) -> trace_correct' st (t ++ [(i, Response (input_key i) v o)])
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : Net.data; handler : Net.input -> Net.data -> Net.output * Net.data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
TC'nil : forall st : data, trace_correct' st []
runHandler = fun (h : input -> GenHandler1 data output) (inp : input) (d : data) => runGenHandler1 d (h inp) : (input -> GenHandler1 data output) -> input -> data -> output * data Arguments runHandler _%function_scope
vard_one_node_params = {| init := init_map; handler := VarDHandler |} : OneNodeParams vard_base_params
Record DiskOpMultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_DiskOpMultiParams { do_name : Type; file_name : Type; do_msg : Type; do_msg_eq_dec : forall x y : do_msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; do_name_eq_dec : forall x y : do_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; file_name_eq_dec : forall x y : file_name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; do_nodes : list do_name; do_all_names_nodes : forall n : do_name, In n do_nodes; do_no_dup_nodes : NoDup do_nodes; do_net_handlers : do_name -> do_name -> do_msg ->...-> list (disk_op file_name) * list Net.output * Net.data * list (do_name * do_msg) } Arguments Build_DiskOpMultiParams _ [do_name file_name do_msg]%type_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope [do_nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%function_scope
Build_MultiParams : forall (P : BaseParams) (name msg : Type), (forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall nodes : list name, (forall n : name, In n nodes) -> NoDup nodes -> (name -> Net.data) -> (name -> name -> msg -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg)) -> (name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg)) -> MultiParams P
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> Net.data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
step_1_ind : forall P : Net.data -> Net.data -> list (Net.input * Net.output) -> Prop, (forall (i : Net.input) (s s' : Net.data) (out : Net.output), handler i s = (out, s') -> P s s' [(i, out)]) -> forall (d d0 : Net.data) (l : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1 d d0 l -> P d d0 l
StringMapList.Raw.PX.MapsTo : forall elt : Type, string -> elt -> list (string * elt) -> Prop
FMapPositive.PositiveMap.ME.MapsTo : forall elt : Type, positive -> elt -> list (positive * elt) -> Prop
assoc_del : forall K V : Type, (forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (K * V) -> K -> list (K * V)
Ring_polynom.r_list_pow : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> list (R * positive) -> R
FMapPositive.PositiveMap.ME.In : forall elt : Type, positive -> list (positive * elt) -> Prop
StringMapList.Raw.PX.In : forall elt : Type, string -> list (string * elt) -> Prop
Ring_polynom.interp_PElist : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Ring_polynom.mkmult_rec : forall R : Type, (R -> R -> positive -> R) -> R -> list (R * positive) -> R
SetoidList.findA : forall A B : Type, (A -> bool) -> list (A * B) -> option B
do_net_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (DiskOpMultiParams0 : DiskOpMultiParams P) => let (do_name, file_name, do_msg, _, _, _, do_nodes, _, _, do_net_handlers, _) as DiskOpMultiParams return (do_name -> do_name -> do_msg -> Net.data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list Net.output * Net.data * list (do_name * do_msg)) := DiskOpMultiParams0 in do_net_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (DiskOpMultiParams : DiskOpMultiParams P), do_name -> do_name -> do_msg -> Net.data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list Net.output * Net.data * list (do_name * do_msg) Arguments do_net_handlers {P DiskOpMultiParams}
net_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, net_handlers, _) as MultiParams return (name -> name -> msg -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg)) := MultiParams0 in net_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams : MultiParams P), name -> name -> msg -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg) Arguments net_handlers {P MultiParams}
do_input_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (DiskOpMultiParams0 : DiskOpMultiParams P) => let (do_name, file_name, do_msg, _, _, _, do_nodes, _, _, _, do_input_handlers) as DiskOpMultiParams return (do_name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list Net.output * Net.data * list (do_name * do_msg)) := DiskOpMultiParams0 in do_input_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (DiskOpMultiParams : DiskOpMultiParams P), do_name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list (disk_op file_name) * list Net.output * Net.data * list (do_name * do_msg) Arguments do_input_handlers {P DiskOpMultiParams}
input_handlers = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, input_handlers) as MultiParams return (name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg)) := MultiParams0 in input_handlers : forall (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams : MultiParams P), name -> Net.input -> Net.data -> list Net.output * Net.data * list (name * msg) Arguments input_handlers {P MultiParams}
Ring_polynom.ring_rw_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe) (Ring_polynom.Pphi_dev rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp cO cI ceqb phi get_sign l npe)
